actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution directing that the Committee on Ways and Means conduct a review of the Mccarthy Plan for national property tax relief.

summary.text: Directs the Ways and Means Committee of the House of Representatives to conduct a thorough and comprehensive review of the McCarthy plan for national property tax relief as a substitute for a reduction in Federal taxes.

titles.title: A resolution directing that the Committee on Ways and Means conduct a review of the Mccarthy Plan for national property tax relief.
